summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Rose Street, from Rainier Avenue to 48th Avenue South; 49th Avenue South and 48th Avenue South, each from south line of Rainier Boulevard Park Addition to north line Moore's Addition to Rainier Boulevard Park Addition; all in The City of Seattle, all in accordance with Petition No. 80550, to the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
